attachment.altText: A watercolor painting depicting a man smiling and making a "V" sign with his right hand. The brushstrokes are rough and the colors used are shades of yellow and green.

markdown.content: About the Art

I enjoyed painting my last watercolor painting so much that here I am again, using the same technique! This time, though, I used a range of colors resulting of mixes between white, yellow, green, blue and black.
I can't help but paint Saulo smiling with bright colors sorrounding him. He's just so silly-
